TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAttributeAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定 必須將類別成員序列化為 XML 屬性。

span.span: Specifies that the must serialize the class member as an XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬於一系列屬性可控制如何序列化，或還原序列化物件。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes, or deserializes, an object. 相似的屬性完整清單，請參閱 < [ 屬性控制 XML 序列化的](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). 當套用至公用欄位或屬性，會通知序列化為 XML 屬性的成員。When applied to a public field or property, the informs the to serialize the member as an XML attribute. 根據預設，序列化公用欄位和屬性做為 XML 項目。By default, the serializes public fields and properties as XML elements. 您可以指派為公用欄位或傳回值 （或值的陣列） 的公用屬性可以對應至其中一個 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 的簡單類型 (包括所有內建資料型別衍生自 XSD `anySimpleType`型別)。You can assign the only to public fields or public properties that return a value (or array of values) that can be mapped to one of the XML Schema definition language (XSD) simple types (including all built-in datatypes derived from the XSD `anySimpleType` type). 可能的類型包含任何可對應到 XSD 簡單類型，包括， ，和列舉型別。The possible types include any that can be mapped to the XSD simple types, including , , and enumerations. 請參閱取得一份 XSD 型別和它們的方式的屬性對應的.net 資料型別。See the property for a list of XSD types and how they are mapped to.NET data types. 有兩種可以使用設定的特殊屬性: `xml:lang` （指定語言） 和`xml:space`（會指定如何處理泛空白字元） 的屬性。There are two special attributes that can be set with the : the `xml:lang` (specifies language) and `xml:space` (specifies how to handle white space) attributes. 這些屬性被用來傳達才能處理 XML 的應用程式的相關資訊。These attributes are intended to convey information that is relevant only to an application processing the XML. 設定這些屬性的範例是以下列程式碼所示。Examples of setting these are shown in the following code. ```csharp [XmlAttribute("xml:lang")] public string Lang; // Set this to 'default' or 'preserve'. [XmlAttribute("space", Namespace = "http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace")] public string Space ``` ```vb _ Public Lang As String ' Set this to 'default' or 'preserve'. _ Public Space As String ``` 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用 word`XmlAttribute`代替較長的程式碼中。You can use the word `XmlAttribute` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別包含數個欄位的套用。The following example serializes a class that contains several fields to which the is applied. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 屬性的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the XML attribute.
The name of the XML attribute.
The default is the member name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用時無法使用預設值，指定 XML 屬性名稱的屬性。Use the property to specify an XML attribute name when the default value cannot be used. 例如，如果 XML 屬性名稱做為成員識別項無效，您可以使用設定識別碼的有效名稱為無效的名稱。For example, if the XML attribute name is invalid as a member identifier, you can use a valid name for the identifier while setting the to an invalid name. ## Examples 下列範例會設定屬性。The following example sets the property of an . [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.AttributeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.AttributeName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.AttributeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.AttributeName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.AttributeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.AttributeName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定由 產生之 XML 屬性的 XSD 資料型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the XSD data type of the XML attribute generated by the .

value.span: XSD (XML 結構描述文件) 資料型別，如全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org ) 文件＜XML Schema: DataTypes＞中所定義。

span.span: An XSD (XML Schema Document) data type, as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema: DataTypes".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的 XSD 簡單資料類型及其.net 對等用法。The following table lists the XSD simple data types with their.NET equivalents. Xsd`base64Binary`並`hexBinary`資料類型使用的陣列結構，並套用使用屬性設為"base64Binary 」 或 「 hexBinary"，視需要。For the XSD `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of structures, and apply a with the property set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate. Xsd`time`並`date`資料類型，使用型別並套用使用設為 「 日期 」 或 「 時間 」。For the XSD `time` and `date` data types, use the type and apply the with the set to "date" or "time". 每個 XSD 類型對應至字串，套用具有其屬性設定為 XSD 型別。For every XSD type that is mapped to a string, apply the with its property set to the XSD type. 不過，這不會變更序列化格式，只有該成員的結構描述。However, this does not change the serialization format, only the schema for the member. > [!NOTE] > 屬性是區分大小寫，因此您必須將它完全 XSD 資料型別之一。The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XSD data types. > [!NOTE] > 將二進位資料做為 XML 項目是比傳遞做為 XML 屬性更有效率。Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient than passing it as an XML attribute. 如需有關 XML 資料類型的詳細資訊，請參閱全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 文件名為 「 XML 結構描述組件 2: Datatypes >。For more information about XML data types, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes". |XSD 資料型別XSD data type|.NET 資料類型.NET data type| |-------------------|--------------------| |anyURIanyURI|| |base64Binarybase64Binary|陣列物件Array of objects| |booleanboolean|| |bytebyte|| |datedate|| |dateTimedateTime|| |decimaldecimal|| |doubledouble|| |ENTITYENTITY|| |實體ENTITIES|| |floatfloat|| |gDaygDay|| |gMonthgMonth|| |gMonthDaygMonthDay|| |gYeargYear|| |gYearMonthgYearMonth|| |hexBinaryhexBinary|陣列物件Array of objects| |IDID|| |IDREFIDREF|| |IDREFSIDREFS|| |intint|| |integerinteger|| |語言language|| |longlong|| |名稱Name|| |NCNameNCName|| |negativeIntegernegativeInteger|| |NMTOKENNMTOKEN|| |NMTOKENSNMTOKENS|| |normalizedStringnormalizedString|| |nonNegativeIntegernonNegativeInteger|| |nonPositiveIntegernonPositiveInteger|| |NOTATIONNOTATION|| |positiveIntegerpositiveInteger|| |QNameQName|| |持續期間duration|| |stringstring|| |shortshort|| |時間time|| |tokentoken|| |unsignedByteunsignedByte|| |unsignedIntunsignedInt|| |unsignedLongunsignedLong|| |unsignedShortunsignedShort|| ## Examples 下列範例會套用給兩個成員和集合屬性設定為不同的值。The following example applies the to two members, and sets the property set to different values. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.DataType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.DataType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.DataType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 產生的 XML 屬性名稱是否為限定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the XML attribute name generated by the is qualified.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否限定或未限定的 XML 項目。The property determines whether an XML element is qualified or unqualified. 屬性符合 1999年http://www.w3.org規格`Namespaces in XML`。The property conforms to the 1999 http://www.w3.org specification `Namespaces in XML`. 如果屬性設定為任何值時，嘗試設定屬性設`XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`會擲回例外狀況。If the property is set to any value, attempting to set the property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` throws an exception. 預設設定， `XmlSchemaForm.None`，會指示檢查 XML 文件，以判斷是否為限定的命名空間的結構描述。The default setting, `XmlSchemaForm.None`, instructs the to check the schema for the XML document to determine whether the namespace is qualified. 如果結構描述未指定個別的項目或屬性的值會使用`elementFormDefault`和`attributeFormDefault`來判斷是否為限定的項目或屬性的值。If the schema does not specify a value for an individual element or attribute, the uses the `elementFormDefault` and `attributeFormDefault` values to determine whether an element or attribute is qualified. 下列 XML 程式碼會顯示結構描述：The following XML code shows a schema: ```xml ``` 時讀取結構描述中，值都`Name`並`Number`是`XmlSchemaForm.None`，但`Name`元素為限定，而`Number`項目是不合格。When the reads the schema, the value for both the `Name` and `Number` is `XmlSchemaForm.None`, but the `Name` element is qualified, while the `Number` element is unqualified. ## Examples 下列範例會套用類別中包含的兩個欄位。The following example applies the to two fields contained in a class. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Form Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Form Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Form Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 屬性的 XML 命名空間。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML namespace of the XML attribute.

value.span: XML 屬性的 XML 命名空間。

span.span: The XML namespace of the XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性符合http://www.w3.org規格`Namespaces in XML`。The property conforms to the http://www.w3.org specification `Namespaces in XML`. 若要建立命名空間與前置詞相關聯，您必須建立物件，其中包含的命名空間和 XML 文件中使用的前置詞。To create namespaces that are associated with prefixes, you must create an object that contains the namespaces and prefixes used in the XML document. 設定每個命名空間必須符合的命名空間中的其中一個物件。The namespace you set for each must match one of the namespaces in the object. 當產生的 XML 程式碼中，正確前置詞的每個屬性名稱。When the generates the XML code, it correctly prefixes each attribute name. ## Examples 下列範例會套用類別中包含的兩個欄位。The following example applies the to two fields contained in a class. 範例會設定不同成員的識別碼值的每個屬性的屬性。The example sets the property for each attribute to a value different from the member identifier. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
